Include Shared Logic in example design

spirit:component.spirit:description: The Xilinx JESD204 PHY core implements a Physical Layer interface to simplify the instantiation of the GTXE2, GTHE2, GTPE2, GTHE3 and GTYE3 transceivers when used with the JESD204 core.
